title: [Large-Scale] Program for Strengthening Nurses' Stress Management Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Real-time video lectures conducted in digitally supported environments. Learning outcomes measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately recognize and analyze stress situations occurring in nursing settings
Learners can select and apply appropriate coping strategies based on stress causes
Learners can practice and evaluate stress management skills through team-based role-playing
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
